articles.description: The GROWTH-India telescope at the Indian Astronomical Observatory in Ladakh recently captured a building-sized asteroid on its approach to Earth.
articles.content:
GROWTH-India Telescope is India's first fully robotic optical research telescope.

articles.title: Ladakh’s Rock Varnish May Help Identify Habitable Environments In Space - Astrobiology News
articles.description: Magnetofossils-- fossil remains of magnetic particles produced by magnetotactic bacteria have been spotted in rock varnish layers in Ladakh.

articles.title: Sunita Williams 'Gardening' In Space As 10-Day Test Flight Stretches Beyond 50 - NDTV
articles.description: Having taken off on Boeing Starliner's maiden flight for what was supposed to be a 10-day mission, Indian-origin astronaut Sunita Williams has now been in space for 50 days and counting.
